alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:33PM EDT until June 25 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MONROE COUNTY... At 633 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monroe, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Monroe County, including the following locations... Newport, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Erie, South Rockwood, La Salle, Bolles Harbor, Woodland Beach and Detroit Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
